text: Shikashi kare-ra wa kono yakusoku o yabuttanode, ware wa mikagitte, kare-ra no kokoro o katakuna ni shita. Kare-ra wa (Keisuke no naka no) jiku no ichi o kae, ataerareta kunkai no ichibubun o wasurete shimatta. Sore de kare-ra no naka no shōsū no mono igai wa, itsumo keiyaku o haki shi, uragiri ni derudearou. Daga kare-ra o yurushite minoga shi nasai.' Hontōni arrā wa yoi okonai o suru mono o o konomi ni nara reru
